#include <ctype.h>
struct timespec ignitioncontrolstart,ignitioncontrolend;
/*--------------------- end user code ---------------------*/

typedef struct IgnitionController IgnitionController;

/* const part of ActorClass (ROM) */
typedef struct IgnitionController_const {
	const char* instName;

	/* simple ports */
	const SendDataConjPort ignitionData;

	/* data receive ports */

	/* saps */

	/* replicated ports */
	const etReplPort receiveData;

	/* services */
} IgnitionController_const;


/* constant for state machine data */
#define IGNITIONCONTROLLER_HISTORY_SIZE 2

/* variable part of ActorClass (RAM) */
struct IgnitionController {
	const IgnitionController_const* const constData;

	/* data send ports */

	/*--------------------- attributes ---------------------*/
	 float64 throttlestart;
	 float32 throttle;
	 float32 speed;
	 float64 throttletime;
	 float64 speedtime;


	/* state machine variables */
	etInt16 state;
	etInt16 history[IGNITIONCONTROLLER_HISTORY_SIZE];
};
